fields.request: Manual QA: Validate Customer Account sigil roots after ContentType rename
fields.request_details:
1. Log into the Django admin and open the Sigil Builder at /admin/sigil-builder/.
2. Locate the ACCT and LIVES sigil roots.
3. Confirm both entries list Customer Account as the content type.
4. Use the Resolve Sigil tool to look up an ACCT prefix and confirm the resolver reports the Customer Account model without errors.
